00152 typedef enum headerGetFlags_e {
00153     HEADERGET_DEFAULT   = 0,
00154     HEADERGET_MINMEM    = (1 << 0), /* string pointers refer to header memory */
00155     HEADERGET_EXT       = (1 << 1), /* lookup extension types too */
00156     HEADERGET_RAW       = (1 << 2), /* return raw contents (no i18n lookups) */
00157     HEADERGET_ALLOC     = (1 << 3), /* always allocate memory for all data */
00158 } headerGetFlags;
